package.title: spamblock
package.description:
Tries to obfuscate mail-addresses on your website using some js and css technique in order to prevent bots from harvesting your mail-addresses. No additional scripts required.
The sources of this module may be found at https://github.com/sidler/module_spamblock
Changelog V 0.8: Updated for Kajona V5 V 0.7: the scriptlet is disabled in case of a submitted form. otherwise submitted mail-addresses may be garbled. V 0.6: for some scenarios, the scriptlet was disabled even when rendering a portal-page
package.author: lorddoc
